description:
Stephanie`s father brought his daughter to the local Pokémon Center where Nurse Joy had 3 starter Pokémon ready for his daughter to choose.
Combusken evolved and was not available as a starter Pokémon for his daughter. When it finally came time for his daughter to choose a starter Pokémon she chose Mudkip.
Treecko and Stephanie`s Father liked each other from the time they met and he asked Nurse Joy if he could keep Treecko.
name: Stephanie`s Father
